isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - ADJUSTMENTS - STRIKER PIN AT LOCK PILLAR

svcproc.title: STRIKER PIN AT LOCK PILLAR
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 219 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a torx head tool (Item 1) and slightly loosen two torx head bolts (Item 2), driver side shown.

This will allow the cab door striker pin (Item 3) and floating tapped striker pin mounting plate (Item 4) to move up or down and in or out at the cab door lock pillar (Item 5) as required, driver side shown.
Move cab door striker pin (Item 3) up, down, in or out as required at cab door lock pillar (Item 5) to obtain proper door fit and latching position.
Once cab door striker pin (Item 3) adjustment is made, hold it in place and tighten both torx head bolts (Item 2) at the cab door lock pillar (Item 5). Tighten to 19 to 23.5 Lbf-ft (26 to 32 N•m).
After the cab door striker pin (Item 3) has been adjusted, close door and check for proper fit. If further adjustment is required, repeat this procedure.
Repeat procedure to adjust passenger side door at the cab door striker pin.
